title: Mahou Sensei Negima!: Introduction Film
synopsis: Before the beginning of the series, three OVAs were produced for the sole purpose of introducing the characters. The first two were released on DVD bundled with two drama CDs, with the third being sold separately. It is unknown if these will ever be released outside of Japan.
characters: ['Springfield, Negi', 'Miyazaki, Nodoka', 'Kagurazaka, Asuna', 'Ayase, Yue', 'Konoe, Konoka', 'Sasaki, Makie', 'McDowell, Evangeline Athanasia Katherine', 'Sakurazaki, Setsuna', 'Hasegawa, Chisame', 'Karakuri, Chachamaru']
voices: ['Satou, Rina', 'Noto, Mamiko', 'Kanda, Akemi', 'Horie, Yui', 'Matsuoka, Yuki', 'Kobayashi, Yuu', 'Watanabe, Akeno']
